summary: I added NPCS to Halo's Aether Suite and a not so liner story for  Aether Suite 3.7.0
descriptionHtml:
[color=#1e84cc][i]       A beautiful world space created by Halo with it's own interesting story, set in a modern time that also ties into Skyrim by making it a virtual reality world.
[/i][/color][center][color=#1e84cc][i]Basically... This ties all my mods together and is that world "Knox" mentioned in a lot of my mods. [/i][/color]


﻿
[img width=737,height=356]http://bestanimations.com/Nature/Water/rain/rain-nature-animated-gif-21.gif[/img]﻿[/center][i]
[/i][center][color=#1e84cc][i]While you'll have to look at the mod requirements and downloads those including Aether Suite many of the files i used in the creation of my edits actually came from mods I've worked on and others I've gotten permission  to use.

1.Have fun exploring for now
2. Use the new alchemy orb
3. Use the new cooking station in your apartment (Your stove works now for compatibility with needs mods)
4. Use Add item menu  to get the new armors or go to the House of Dibella to get them.
5. Be careful your apartment  is haunted by a "friendly ghost"
6.There are some followers in  the Arclite Community College. 
7. Until Content gets filled in and I navmesh what's not yet been navmeshed by Halo you can use 
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5604]28 Days and a Bit 5: A Zombie Mutation Outbreak mod here on the nexus:[/url]﻿
It spawns zombies both in interiors and exteriors. I love it ! 
﻿[/i][/color][color=#1e84cc][i]

[/i]
[/color][/center][color=#1e84cc][i]
        The male clothing in this mod are BBB just like the women's clothing I've made some of Halo's clothing compatible with the CBBE HDT body as well. [/i][/color][color=#1e84cc][i] ﻿I'm hoping to have this finished before the end of the Summer so that I as well as everyone else can enjoy it!

﻿
﻿ ﻿For the most enjoyment I recommend using HHaily's ENB, My ENB, or  PV ENB with the pallet file included on the downloads section. ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿
﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ ﻿ PV ENB gives no performance drops at all[/i]


[/color][center][color=#1e84cc][i]Down With The Wall[/i][/color][/center]
﻿ ﻿ ﻿

﻿ ﻿ [youtube]47xhfJvTJXI[/youtube]
[center][color=#1e84cc](Halo's original Video doesn't show all of Aether Suite or the many recent changes)
[/color][/center]


[center][color=#1e84cc]Other Notes:[/color][/center][color=#1e84cc]
If you have any trouble loading Skyrim or the world space then I suggest you utilize skyrim's .ini patches, Loot and wyrebash and Bethini. These have helped me immensely to keep my skyrim adventure going even on weak laptops ... like my 2010 MacBook pro :D that thankfully I have replaced with a much newer and more powerful laptop.

[/color][center][color=#1e84cc]All of my files were created with TES5-edit cleaned Masters and are virus free :) [/color][/center]
author: Halo
